paragraphs.title: 1. Setup
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
import sys
sys.path.insert(0, '/src')

import numpy as np
from labyrinth_env import LabyrinthEnv, ZeppelinBridge
from labyrinth_env.env import EnvConfig

print("Labyrinth RL - 2D Game")
print("="*40)

paragraphs.title: 2. Initialize Game
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
config = EnvConfig(
    dt=1.0/60.0,
    max_steps=5000,
    steps_per_move=15
)

bridge = ZeppelinBridge(z, config=config)
result = bridge.init_game('level_01_tutorial')

state = bridge.get_state()
z.angularBind('state', state)
z.angularBind('ball', state.get('ball', {}))
z.angularBind('status', 'Ready!')
z.angularBind('step_count', 0)

print(f"Level: {result['info']['level_id']}")
print(f"Ball: {state['ball']['position']}")
print('Click board, then use WASD to play!')

paragraphs.title: 3. Game UI
Up
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
r = bridge.move_up()
z.angularBind('state', bridge.get_state())
z.angularBind('ball', bridge.get_state().get('ball', {}))
z.angularBind('step_count', bridge.env._step_count)
if r['done']: z.angularBind('status', 'SUCCESS!' if r['info'].get('success') else 'FAILED!')

paragraphs.title: Reset
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
bridge.reset()
state = bridge.get_state()
z.angularBind('state', state)
z.angularBind('ball', state.get('ball', {}))
z.angularBind('status', 'Ready!')
z.angularBind('step_count', 0)
print('Reset!')
